name: Spell Color: Spell Words, Color Grid
name_original: Spell Color: Spell Words, Color Grid
description:
— Spell Color —

Swipe Letters, Spell Words, Color Grid!

Swipe over the letter tiles to spell words and try to color the entire grid.

Every time you use a letter, its color changes.
Use each letter at least 3 times to color the entire grid.

Discover 3, 4, 5, 6 & 7-letter words.

Need help? Use Clues to discover new words and improve your vocabulary!

Features:

+ Dictionary : check the meaning of each word during / at the end of the game
+ Universal app
+ GameCenter: compete on 2 leaderboards and try to earn 20 achievements
+ iCloud Sync: sync your game scores across multiple devices
